author: FourFourTwo
description: The AFA has signalled its intention to appoint Jorge Sampaoli as the new Argentina coach, with the Sevilla boss keen to take the role.
title: Sampaoli could not turn down Argentina job offer

description: Lionel Messi is in, but Neymar is out as Argentina and Brazil name seriously strong squads for their friendly match at the MCG in June.
title: Messi Melbourne-bound, but no Neymar for Argentina-Brazil friendly

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Inter striker Mauro Icardi and Atalanta forward Alejandro Gomez have been called up by Argentina for games against Brazil and Singapore.
title: Argentina call up Icardi & Papu

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Inter striker Mauro Icardi and Atalanta forward Alejandro Gomez have been called up by Argentina for games against Brazil and Singapore.
title: Argentina call up Icardi & Papu

author: FourFourTwo
description: Sevilla closed their season by beating Osasuna 5-0 but Jorge Sampaoli was left fighting his corner over an expected departure to Argentina.
title: I'm not a mercenary - Sampaoli explains Sevilla, Argentina situation

author: FourFourTwo
description: Sergio Aguero is absent from the Argentina squad for games against Brazil and Singapore, while Mauro Icardi has won a long-awaited recall.
title: Icardi earns Argentina recall for Brazil friendly, Aguero omitted

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Gonzalo Higuain spoke of his youth, surviving meningitis and having football in the blood. “Italy is most similar to Argentina.”
title: Higuain: 'I survived meningitis'

author: Football Italia Staff
description:
Juventus left-back Alex Sandro has been included in the Brazil squad to face Argentina and Australia.
	
	The defender has come to be regarded as one of the best in the world in his position, but so far he has only been given six caps for the Selecao.
	
	However, after two goals and five assists this season, he has earned a recall to the squad for the upcoming friendlies.
	
	Brazil squad to face Argentina and Australia:
title: Alex Sandro in Brazil squad
